LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: And so――

LABEL: 0x2DA
STRING: The Argo float was ejected.

LABEL: 0x302
STRING: Inside were the <Onyx> and the triage tag.

LABEL: 0x33A
STRING: Yukari's <Onyx> and Hiragino's triage tag were attached to the float

LABEL: 0x372
STRING: that Touri had spotted and Tokiwa had caught.

LABEL: 0x3C0
STRING: ...There was the question of what I had done in all this, but...

LABEL: 0x46A
STRING: Nevertheless, our last lifeline, carrying the hopes of everyone here, was released toward the surface.

LABEL: 0x4C0
STRING: The Argo float rose to the surface, to where it could no longer be seen from the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x518
STRING: All that remained was to watch and wait.

LABEL: 0x544
STRING: However, we no longer felt the frustration of not being able to do anything.

LABEL: 0x580
STRING: We did everything we could.

LABEL: 0x5A8
STRING: We did our best.

LABEL: 0x5C6
STRING: I was certain of that.

LABEL: 0x641
STRING: That was why―it was scary.

LABEL: 0x663
STRING: If this didn't work out...

LABEL: 0x683
STRING: If this didn't reach anyone and help didn't come――

LABEL: 0x724
STRING: ...But, we'd cross that bridge when we got there.

LABEL: 0x750
STRING: Until we found our next move.

LABEL: 0x772
STRING: I by no means thought that would be an easy task, but that didn't mean we should dwell on it.

LABEL: 0x7D0
STRING: All we could do now was pray.

LABEL: 0x7FA
STRING: Pray that we'd reach the surface――

LABEL: 0x973
STRING: 「...It will work.」

LABEL: 0xA03
STRING: 「...Yes, I hope so.」

LABEL: 0xA32
STRING: Touri whispered with deep emotion.

LABEL: 0xA52
STRING: Yukari didn't look too happy in response―her voice was somber, as if she wasn't feeling well.

LABEL: 0xAAA
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0xAD5
STRING: 「Is something wrong, Momoi?」

LABEL: 0xAF7
STRING: 「Hey, if you're not feeling well――」

LABEL: 0xB60
STRING: Hiragino walked up to her.

LABEL: 0xB86
STRING: A moment later, Yukari's legs became tangled, and she barely managed to stand up while supported by Hiragino.

LABEL: 0xBE0
STRING: They were almost embracing each other, and under normal circumstances, Hiragino would be showered with insults.

LABEL: 0xC3C
STRING: However, Yukari looked like a completely different person with how meek she was.

LABEL: 0xD4B
STRING: 「Momoi...」

LABEL: 0xD74
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0xDF1
STRING: 「I was just thinking about the past.」

LABEL: 0xE23
STRING: 「I hope the Argo Float reaches them safely.」

LABEL: 0xEC5
STRING: 「Is this really the time to be saying that?」

LABEL: 0xF42
STRING: 「Are you feeling anemic? Maybe you should lie down for a bit...」

LABEL: 0xF7B
STRING: Hiragino raised his head as he spoke.

LABEL: 0xFA5
STRING: But unfortunately, this was the laboratory―there were no beds for the sick here.

LABEL: 0x1071
STRING: 「Sorry, I'm fine. I can stand on my own.」

LABEL: 0x1113
STRING: 「Even if you say that... Hey――」

LABEL: 0x11B3
STRING: 「But... you're right. I'll go to a crew room to rest.」

LABEL: 0x11F7
STRING: 「I'll be fine on my own, so you can stay here with everyone, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x12CE
STRING: 「A little...」

LABEL: 0x12E8
STRING: 「Please leave me alone for a little while.」

LABEL: 0x1353
STRING: Before Hiragino could say anything, Yukari left the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x138D
STRING: Looking at her back, her steps were indeed steady.

LABEL: 0x13C9
STRING: I didn't think I had anything to worry about on that front, but what was with her wanting to be alone?

LABEL: 0x142B
STRING: ――And.

LABEL: 0x14CC
STRING: Reiri was looking suspiciously at the door Yukari had just left through.

LABEL: 0x1508
STRING: She was biting her nails while thinking about something.

LABEL: 0x1540
STRING: 「What is it, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x158B
STRING: 「...No, it's nothing.」

LABEL: 0x160E
STRING: 「I must be overthinking it.」

LABEL: 0x164D
STRING: With that, the tense atmosphere suddenly eased.

LABEL: 0x168B
STRING: Always overthinking things...

LABEL: 0x16C1
STRING: She was proud of surviving only through her knowledge.

LABEL: 0x17CE
STRING: 「Is Yukari-san okay?」

LABEL: 0x1860
STRING: 「...She never listens to anyone once she gets started.」

LABEL: 0x18A0
STRING: 「Being strangely stubborn... Taking everything on by herself...」

LABEL: 0x1966
STRING: 「If you're that worried, why don't you go take a look?」

LABEL: 0x1A08
STRING: 「There's no need to worry. Momoi said so herself, didn't she?」

LABEL: 0x1A53
STRING: 「Hmm?」

LABEL: 0x1A72
STRING: Touri tilted her head in confusion.

LABEL: 0x1AA2
STRING: Hiragino popped a xylitol tablet into his mouth and turned away from Touri to chew it.

LABEL: 0x1AFA
STRING: ...I wasn't sure which one of them was being stubborn here.

LABEL: 0x1B50
STRING: 「Now then... Why don't we all get some rest?」

LABEL: 0x1B7C
STRING: 「While there's a time limit on our escape, there's not much we can do right now.」

LABEL: 0x1C3C
STRING: 「Shouldn't we go to the wheelhouse?」

LABEL: 0x1CBD
STRING: 「It'd be bad if we can't respond right away if the signal happens to recover!」

LABEL: 0x1D19
STRING: Right... The <SHEEP III's> communication equipment was now working fine, thanks to Reiri and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x1D72
STRING: If the satellite was hit by a super flare, there was nothing that could be done,

LABEL: 0x1DBE
STRING: but in the unlikely event that we were able to get through to the surface, it was no use if we were unable to respond.

LABEL: 0x1E7E
STRING: 「All right, let's go to the wheelhouse then.」

LABEL: 0x1EA4
STRING: 「Since we're going there, I'll have to give her a heads up.」

LABEL: 0x1EFC
STRING: 「I guess there's no choice... I don't really want to, but I'll go check on Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x1FDB
STRING: 「What's with that face?」

LABEL: 0x2002
STRING: 「I'm sure you can guess.」

LABEL: 0x2056
STRING: With that, we headed to the crew rooms...

LABEL: 0x2324
STRING: 「Momoi, I'm coming in, okay?」

LABEL: 0x2353
STRING: 「No, you can't.」

LABEL: 0x23CF
STRING: Touri stopped Hiragino, who barely knocked on the slightly opened door

LABEL: 0x240F
STRING: and was about to rush into the crew room without waiting for an answer.

LABEL: 0x24CF
STRING: 「I'll go check on her, so you wait here.」

LABEL: 0x2539
STRING: Hiragino nodded, unable to say anything.

LABEL: 0x2577
STRING: ...How should I put it? Hiragino lacked delicacy in the weirdest ways.

LABEL: 0x25C5
STRING: I wondered if it was because he was involved in emergency rescue work and was used to an environment where every minute counted...

LABEL: 0x261F
STRING: ...No, it was probably just his personality.

LABEL: 0x2649
STRING: Hiragino was fidgeting restlessly, unable to hide his feelings. He was just standing there, but he managed to be somewhat noisy either way.

LABEL: 0x26A9
STRING: The situation was amusing in its own way. After a few seconds, Touri returned.

LABEL: 0x26F9
STRING: Her expression didn't bode well.

LABEL: 0x277F
STRING: 「Yukari-san isn't here...」

LABEL: 0x27B6
STRING: 「What did you say?」

LABEL: 0x2863
STRING: He flung the door open and peered inside.

LABEL: 0x288F
STRING: She certainly wasn't in there... On the contrary, there was no sign of her even returning to this room.

LABEL: 0x28E3
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x290E
STRING: 「Gh...! Where did she go?!」

LABEL: 0x293F
STRING: 「...I knew it.」

LABEL: 0x2962
STRING: Reiri nodded to herself.

LABEL: 0x297E
STRING: She showed no sign of surprise, like she had anticipated this turn of events.

LABEL: 0x2A3A
STRING: 「She's been acting strange for a while now.」

LABEL: 0x2A72
STRING: 「She seemed to be brooding over something quite a bit.」

LABEL: 0x2AB9
STRING: 「...What are you trying to say?」

LABEL: 0x2B49
STRING: 「Her eyes were the same as Katagiri's a while back.」

LABEL: 0x2B84
STRING: 「Same as mine...?」

LABEL: 0x2BB5
STRING: 「Eyes that never ceased to regret sinking the <SHEEP III> and causing dozens of deaths――」

LABEL: 0x2C6F
STRING: 「Those were the eyes of a criminal.」

LABEL: 0x2CA4
STRING: 「No way...」

LABEL: 0x2CC5
STRING: Hiragino was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x2CE3
STRING: The eyes of a criminal―no one asked how Reiri could tell such a thing.

LABEL: 0x2D3D
STRING: It wasn't a question of whether we believed her words or not.

LABEL: 0x2D71
STRING: The fact that Yukari had lied to us and disappeared told us everything.

LABEL: 0x2E9A
STRING: 「No way... The wheelhouse!」

LABEL: 0x2F2C
STRING: 「Don't be hasty.」

LABEL: 0x2F44
STRING: 「What would she do there?」

LABEL: 0x2F8B
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x3017
STRING: 「Don't tell me―!」

LABEL: 0x3072
STRING: Hiragino ran away by himself without saying anything more to us.

LABEL: 0x30BB
STRING: 「Hey, Hiragino-san!」

LABEL: 0x30E6
STRING: Touri chased after him, followed by Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3134
STRING: Reached out to Reiri.

LABEL: 0x31C2
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x31E3
STRING: 「I need the key you have.」

LABEL: 0x3279
STRING: 「Sharp as ever.」

LABEL: 0x32B0
STRING: As she replied, Reiri took the keycard out of her pocket, and I snatched it from her.

LABEL: 0x3304
STRING: I turned on my heel and started running.

LABEL: 0x3363
STRING: 「I'll be there soon.」

LABEL: 0x3386
STRING: Reiri sent me on my way and I headed toward my destination.

LABEL: 0x33C0
STRING: The place Hiragino and everyone else were headed――

LABEL: 0x33EC
STRING: Where Yukari was trying to do something at――

LABEL: 0x341C
STRING: To <Alice>, sleeping in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x36DF
STRING: What I received from Reiri was the master key we had stolen from Yukari's pocket.

LABEL: 0x3729
STRING: The forged master key I'd made should now be in her possession.

LABEL: 0x376F
STRING: If that was the case――

LABEL: 0x379A
STRING: 「Damn you, Momoi!」

LABEL: 0x37C5
STRING: Sure enough, they were all stranded in front of the emergency room, which was locked from the inside.

LABEL: 0x3807
STRING: I entered their circle and unlocked the door with the master key.

LABEL: 0x385C
STRING: With the sound of the door unlocking, we all surged into the room.

LABEL: 0x389A
STRING: We passed through the examination room, where nothing had changed.

LABEL: 0x38D2
STRING: We headed to the treatment room, where Hikari was sleeping――

LABEL: 0x3969
STRING: 「Haah, haah.」

LABEL: 0x3989
STRING: We entered the room out of breath,

LABEL: 0x39D3
STRING: and what greeted us was Hikari, still sleeping on the bed.

LABEL: 0x3A0B
STRING: Her sleeping face remained the same as before,

LABEL: 0x3A39
STRING: calm and peaceful, like we weren't in the middle of this catastrophe at all.

LABEL: 0x3A8B
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x3AA3
STRING: There was one more person there.

LABEL: 0x3BDC
STRING: 「...Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x3BFB
STRING: Yukari was next to the bed where Hikari was sleeping.

LABEL: 0x3C99
STRING: 「Oh, what's wrong, everyone?」

LABEL: 0x3D28
STRING: 「Even though she's sleeping due to <Alice>, why don't you show a little more care in front of the sick?」

LABEL: 0x3D89
STRING: Yukari admonished us as we rushed inside.

LABEL: 0x3DC7
STRING: Her resolute demeanor made her seem defiant.

LABEL: 0x3E0D
STRING: Or, perhaps it was a bulwark against Hiragino's voice, which lowered in anger and confusion.

LABEL: 0x3F2A
STRING: 「Momoi, get away from her.」

LABEL: 0x3FC2
STRING: 「Why?」

LABEL: 0x3FDE
STRING: 「I haven't done anything.」

LABEL: 0x4008
STRING: 「I simply wanted to see how she was doing.」

LABEL: 0x40A6
STRING: 「That's not what I'm talking about!」

LABEL: 0x40CC
STRING: 「――You were so afraid of <Alice's> infection before, so why are you so close to her now?」

LABEL: 0x41B3
STRING: She didn't lose her brazenness, but she held her tongue at Hiragino's question.

LABEL: 0x41F7
STRING: Keeping one's mouth shut without mending the contradictions in one's words and actions was like the practice of a corrupt politician.

LABEL: 0x42DF
STRING: 「Yukari-san, please answer me.」

LABEL: 0x4305
STRING: 「What did you do to my sister?」

LABEL: 0x4379
STRING: 「Were you also trying to use her as a tool?」

LABEL: 0x4450
STRING: Tokiwa glared straight at Yukari, but still, she didn't answer.

LABEL: 0x448E
STRING: ...What in the world was going on?

LABEL: 0x44B8
STRING: For what purpose did she do all this?

LABEL: 0x44E8
STRING: At that moment...

LABEL: 0x4545
STRING: 「You've been awfully quiet.」

LABEL: 0x4570
STRING: Reiri entered the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x4592
STRING: Not hesitating in the slightest, she passed between us and faced Yukari across the bed.

LABEL: 0x46B1
STRING: 「So, you've decided to stay silent? You don't know when to give up.」

LABEL: 0x4735
STRING: 「I see. In that case, I'll tell you.」

LABEL: 0x4772
STRING: She cleared her throat.

LABEL: 0x4796
STRING: Without a hint of a smile, Reiri spoke with a serious expression.

LABEL: 0x483C
STRING: 「Momoi Yukari. You're planning on keeping us in this cage.」

LABEL: 0x48DF
STRING: She wasn't trying to do anything to Hikari, but rather the <SHEEP III> itself...?

LABEL: 0x492A
STRING: How was that possible?

LABEL: 0x496E
STRING: Reiri didn't bother gauging the reactions of those around her, but rather spoke matter-of-factly.

LABEL: 0x4A16
STRING: 「The messenger buoy wire.」

LABEL: 0x4A44
STRING: 「It was clearly artificially severed. It was cut from the start.」

LABEL: 0x4AA2
STRING: 「I thought it might have gotten caught in a propeller or something, but...」

LABEL: 0x4AE6
STRING: 「The number of vessels navigating Kurama Bay is very limited. They're almost non-existent.」

LABEL: 0x4B3C
STRING: 「And, you were carrying the buoy around like it was the most important thing in the world, weren't you?」

LABEL: 0x4B7C
STRING: 「When you set it up, you turned your back on us and seemed to be struggling quite a bit...」

LABEL: 0x4C08
STRING: 「And when we first tried to eject the Argo float earlier, I wonder if that was just a mistake.」

LABEL: 0x4C72
STRING: 「You seem to know a lot about the Argo Project.」

LABEL: 0x4CA8
STRING: 「A rescue message inside an Argo float that couldn't be recovered...」

LABEL: 0x4CF6
STRING: 「Even Touri realized it. It would be strange if you didn't.」

LABEL: 0x4DD1
STRING: 「That brings this whole <Onyx> business into question.」

LABEL: 0x4E17
STRING: 「――There's nothing inside it, is there?」

LABEL: 0x4E56
STRING: 「What...? Then what was the point of the Argo float――」

LABEL: 0x4ED0
STRING: 「And now you're trying to get your hands on <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x4F1A
STRING: 「You even lied to the doctor.」

LABEL: 0x4F9D
STRING: 「I don't know if it ended in an attempt, but...」

LABEL: 0x5060
STRING: Reiri's suspicion of Yukari grew stronger with each word.

LABEL: 0x50A2
STRING: Could she really be――?

LABEL: 0x50D9
STRING: 「Why don't you say something?」

LABEL: 0x518B
STRING: 「...That's all circumstantial evidence.」

LABEL: 0x51B5
STRING: 「If you're going to pretend to be a detective, I wish you'd be a little more level-headed.」

LABEL: 0x526D
STRING: 「Isn't this suspicious closed-room environment enough?」

LABEL: 0x52AD
STRING: 「If I'm wrong, then I need you to correct me and explain.」

LABEL: 0x5354
STRING: 「It's a necessary process for your beloved unity, you know? Why don't you take a look at everyone's faces?」

LABEL: 0x53B5
STRING: Reiri was triumphant.

LABEL: 0x53D1
STRING: The way she spoke was excessively sadistic and hard to agree with,

LABEL: 0x5413
STRING: but what she was saying couldn't be disputed.

LABEL: 0x5441
STRING: The small discomfort I had felt up until now and her incomprehensible behavior... It was all rearranged in my head and transformed into intense suspicion.

LABEL: 0x54EB
STRING: Yukari closed her eyes and gave a small nod.

LABEL: 0x5513
STRING: There was a moment of silence.

LABEL: 0x552D
STRING: Finally, she opened her eyes again.

LABEL: 0x55C5
STRING: 「There are two things I have to correct.」

LABEL: 0x55F5
STRING: 「First of all, I wasn't trying to do anything to this girl.」

LABEL: 0x5652
STRING: 「You can say whatever you want.」

LABEL: 0x568B
STRING: 「I'm not asking you to believe me.」

LABEL: 0x56B9
STRING: 「But, that's the truth.」

LABEL: 0x56E0
STRING: As she spoke, Yukari looked down at the girl sleeping in front of her.

LABEL: 0x571C
STRING: What was she thinking as she stared at the lone sleeping Hikari?

LABEL: 0x574A
STRING: Yukari's eyes looked pained as she gazed at her――

LABEL: 0x578D
STRING: 「It's just... I've never been able to face it properly before.」

LABEL: 0x57D7
STRING: 「I came to apologize.」

LABEL: 0x5856
STRING: 「Well... She didn't wake up.」

LABEL: 0x5919
STRING: 「And one more thing.」

LABEL: 0x5933
STRING: 「The <Onyx> isn't empty.」

LABEL: 0x5967
STRING: 「It contains all the data up until the moment I took it out of the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x59B5
STRING: 「There's not a single missing piece of information.」

LABEL: 0x5A42
STRING: 「...But I'm certain that ROMLES won't come to save us.」

LABEL: 0x5A82
STRING: 「Absolutely certain.」

LABEL: 0x5A9F
STRING: Yukari made her proclamation.

LABEL: 0x5ABD
STRING: If Yukari was right and the <Onyx> described everything that had happened on the <SHEEP III>,

LABEL: 0x5B24
STRING: then the existence of survivors should be obvious.

LABEL: 0x5B50
STRING: Besides, as Tokiwa had said, the information from the triage tag should reach the life-saving facilities.

LABEL: 0x5BB4
STRING: And yet, she was sure we wouldn't be rescued――

LABEL: 0x5BE4
STRING: 「What the hell is inside that <Onyx>?」

LABEL: 0x5C24
STRING: 「How much information is there that's inconvenient for ROMLES?」

LABEL: 0x5C6A
STRING: 「What happened on this ship...」

LABEL: 0x5D10
STRING: 「――This ship has an <Alice> outbreak and has been invaded by <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x5D5C
STRING: 「All of those facts are included inside the <Onyx>.」

LABEL: 0x5D9C
STRING: 「On top of that, I added a message.」

LABEL: 0x5E37
STRING: 「"Abandon this ship"――」

LABEL: 0x5E6E
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0x5E88
STRING: Why would she do that?!

LABEL: 0x5F84
STRING: 「That's terrible...」

LABEL: 0x5FFD
STRING: 「Don't you want to be saved, Yukari-san?!」

LABEL: 0x6099
STRING: 「Why... would you do something like that, severing our hope?!」

LABEL: 0x60E2
STRING: Yukari made a bitter face at the voices showering upon her.

LABEL: 0x6114
STRING: She appeared to be torn between whether to say it or not.

LABEL: 0x614C
STRING: Eventually, she whispered in a low voice, as if she had given up.

LABEL: 0x61C1
STRING: 「Because, we can't get out...」

LABEL: 0x61F4
STRING: 「Momoi?」

LABEL: 0x6278
STRING: 「We're never getting out of here anyway!」

LABEL: 0x6333
STRING: 「There's a possibility that all of us have been infected with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x637B
STRING: 「All of us have been in contact with her in some way――」

LABEL: 0x6412
STRING: 「So, there's no way we can escape!」

LABEL: 0x645F
STRING: 「...There's a good chance that we're infected with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x6499
STRING: 「But the cure――」

LABEL: 0x6529
STRING: 「There is no cure.」

LABEL: 0x654E
STRING: Hiragino was startled.

LABEL: 0x656E
STRING: Could it be that our conversation in the infirmary last night――

LABEL: 0x65A2
STRING: The lie that <Alice> had a cure and we would be fine

LABEL: 0x65F2
STRING: was exposed.

LABEL: 0x661D
STRING: 「――<Alice> is a deadly virus.」

LABEL: 0x6658
STRING: Her voice rang out, devoid of warmth.

LABEL: 0x6693
STRING: 「There's no way we can call for help.」

LABEL: 0x66BD
STRING: 「If we bring a rescue team to this space that has been defiled by <Alice>, we'll only bring more people into harm's way.」

LABEL: 0x6727
STRING: 「And before that, by the time rescue comes, we'll all be dead.」

LABEL: 0x677F
STRING: 「Even if we survive, we'll just end up like Ryuuzen.」

LABEL: 0x67CA
STRING: Yukari's face contorted in pain the moment she mentioned Ryuuzen's name.

LABEL: 0x680A
STRING: The leader of the three who were caught up in the <SHEEP> accident.

LABEL: 0x684A
STRING: Even now, after the accident, he continued to sleep...

LABEL: 0x68A0
STRING: 「Then why were you trying to send a message to the surface?」

LABEL: 0x68F8
STRING: 「If you didn't intend to be saved from the start, then why――」

LABEL: 0x69CB
STRING: Yukari let out a sigh.

LABEL: 0x69EB
STRING: What was she looking at as she gazed off into the distance?

LABEL: 0x6A35
STRING: Was it not hope?

LABEL: 0x6A6E
STRING: 「――To do one's best to reach the worst.」

LABEL: 0x6AA2
STRING: 「It's one thing to do nothing and face the worst with the thought, "If only I had done things differently."」

LABEL: 0x6B0A
STRING: 「That's not it. Not at all.」

LABEL: 0x6BB9
STRING: 「I know that.」

LABEL: 0x6BDF
STRING: 「If I've done everything in my power and reach the worst outcome, I can accept it.」

LABEL: 0x6C23
STRING: 「I have no choice but to accept it.」

LABEL: 0x6C47
STRING: 「So, I cooperated.」

LABEL: 0x6C71
STRING: 「With all I had.」

LABEL: 0x6C9C
STRING: 「Yukari!」

LABEL: 0x6CB7
STRING: His voice was angry.

LABEL: 0x6CD3
STRING: Hiragino looked angry, yet there was something sad about him――

LABEL: 0x6DD6
STRING: 「If you're that smart, then why give up?!」

LABEL: 0x6E14
STRING: 「Didn't it ever occur to you that there might be another way to make the best of things?!」

LABEL: 0x6E5A
STRING: 「You're just desperate because you think you're going to die!」

LABEL: 0x6EC1
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x6F3E
STRING: 「Then what would you do?!」

LABEL: 0x6F7E
STRING: 「In a closed space like this, infected by a lethal virus that doesn't even have a cure...」

LABEL: 0x6FD8
STRING: 「And yet you still tell us to "look for the best solution" and "don't give up hope."」

LABEL: 0x702A
STRING: 「How can you be so cruel?!」

LABEL: 0x705C
STRING: 「Answer me! You idiot...!」

LABEL: 0x70C9
STRING: Yukari spat out her words in a scream.

LABEL: 0x70EF
STRING: She was almost in tears, and we had no answer for her.

LABEL: 0x714B
STRING: If a lethal virus had spread and everyone was infected――

LABEL: 0x7191
STRING: Just as Yukari had said, there had been no hope from the start.

LABEL: 0x723F
STRING: We were just waiting to die.

LABEL: 0x725B
STRING: It was simply about how much hope we could muster while waiting to die in contentment.

LABEL: 0x72D3
STRING: Silence.

LABEL: 0x72ED
STRING: Everything we'd done so far had been for naught.

LABEL: 0x7325
STRING: It was meaningless from the start.

LABEL: 0x734D
STRING: No matter what we did from now on, there was no point.

LABEL: 0x738D
STRING: All of this was meaningless.

LABEL: 0x73AD
STRING: A sense of helplessness reigned inside the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x73D3
STRING: No one could speak up.

LABEL: 0x7454
STRING: Until... he broke the silence.

LABEL: 0x748B
STRING: 「Listen carefully, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x74B9
STRING: 「There's something big you're misunderstanding.」

LABEL: 0x74EA
STRING: Struggling to speak, Hiragino slowly opened his mouth and chose his words carefully.

LABEL: 0x7689
STRING: 「It's true that <Alice> is an astounding virus.」

LABEL: 0x76BF
STRING: 「In addition to the fear of the virus itself,

LABEL: 0x7705
STRING: the really scary thing is that if you get infected with it, you'll be completely deprived of your freedom.」

LABEL: 0x7745
STRING: 「There aren't many recorded cases... so you'll definitely be experimented on.」

LABEL: 0x778B
STRING: 「But <Alice>―it's not a lethal virus.」

LABEL: 0x7862
STRING: 「Being infected with <Alice> will not kill you.」

LABEL: 0x78A3
STRING: Hiragino outright dismissed Yukari's earlier appeal.

LABEL: 0x78D9
STRING: If <Alice> wasn't a lethal virus, there was still a chance we could be saved.

LABEL: 0x7929
STRING: Yukari or Hiragino, which one was right――

LABEL: 0x7966
STRING: 「How――」

LABEL: 0x79DF
STRING: 「Stop joking around! No matter how you look at it, lying like that is just too cruel.」

LABEL: 0x7A97
STRING: 「I'm not joking.」

LABEL: 0x7ABB
STRING: 「You know I've researched <Alice>, right?」

LABEL: 0x7B19
STRING: 「If I were lying, wouldn't I tell a better one?」

LABEL: 0x7C3A
STRING: 「Then what about seven years ago?!」

LABEL: 0x7C67
STRING: 「Even though "she" died...?!」

LABEL: 0x7C9E
STRING: One of them was dead, and the other asleep――

LABEL: 0x7CD6
STRING: The fate of those infected by <Alice> whom Yukari spoke of.

LABEL: 0x7D0A
STRING: The one that had died...

LABEL: 0x7D2E
STRING: I shook my head.

LABEL: 0x7D4C
STRING: Focus your mind on the present.

LABEL: 0x7E5D
STRING: 「...Let me tell you a painful story. Listen to me calmly.」

LABEL: 0x7E96
STRING: What was he going to talk about?

LABEL: 0x7EBE
STRING: In front of us, who watched with bated breaths, Hiragino began to speak.

LABEL: 0x7F64
STRING: 「Certainly, seven years ago――」

LABEL: 0x7F86
STRING: 「Ryuuzen Haruki, your leader, was infected with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x7FC8
STRING: 「He developed <Alice> inside that submarine and collapsed.」

LABEL: 0x8010
STRING: 「You're certain of that?」

LABEL: 0x803F
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x80B6
STRING: 「By the time I saw him, he was cyanotic...」

LABEL: 0x8103
STRING: 「Didn't he complain about insomnia?」

LABEL: 0x812D
STRING: 「That's... what you said.」

LABEL: 0x8158
STRING: Yukari nodded.

LABEL: 0x8170
STRING: If he fell asleep and couldn't wake up, there was a high probability that it was due to <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x81C6
STRING: Recognizing that Yukari had no objections, Hiragino continued.

LABEL: 0x8209
STRING: 「...How about this theory?」

LABEL: 0x8235
STRING: 「Ryuuzen Haruki had sleep apnea.」

LABEL: 0x82FE
STRING: 「This might be the first time you've heard of it, but I don't think there's anything you can deny.」

LABEL: 0x8342
STRING: 「If you have sleep apnea, it's quite common for it to be accompanied by insomnia.」

LABEL: 0x838A
STRING: 「And back then, he fell asleep due to <Alice's> effect.」

LABEL: 0x83C4
STRING: 「Naturally, he would then run out of oxygen.」

LABEL: 0x83F9
STRING: 「So, <Alice> wasn't the cause of his cyanosis...」

LABEL: 0x84A7
STRING: 「It's one of the reasons, though.」

LABEL: 0x84D3
STRING: 「After falling asleep due to <Alice>, Ryuuzen Haruki ran out of oxygen because of his chronic sleep apnea.」

LABEL: 0x8539
STRING: 「That's what I think happened.」

LABEL: 0x8587
STRING: In other words, <Alice> had simply put Ryuuzen Haruki to sleep?

LABEL: 0x85CB
STRING: Hiragino's theory sounded convincing.

LABEL: 0x8601
STRING: However, Yukari was frozen in place, unable to say anything in the face of this new information.

LABEL: 0x8653
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x866B
STRING: Hiragino frowned again, looking terribly pained.

LABEL: 0x869F
STRING: What was he trying to say?

LABEL: 0x86C9
STRING: What did he think he had to say?

LABEL: 0x86F9
STRING: He continued.

LABEL: 0x8724
STRING: 「When you saw Ryuuzen in cyanosis, you tried to supply him with oxygen.」

LABEL: 0x87CD
STRING: 「However, what you gave him wasn't that.」

LABEL: 0x8816
STRING: 「――That's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x8844
STRING: 「The only gas on board was oxygen.」

LABEL: 0x8876
STRING: 「Because that's what the experiment was all about. We were going to release oxygen from near the seafloor of Kurama Bay――」

LABEL: 0x88DD
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x88FA
STRING: This time it was Tokiwa who spoke up.

LABEL: 0x8924
STRING: She had been silent all this time, but now the puzzle pieces were falling into place.

LABEL: 0x8A05
STRING: 「I, too, thought it was oxygen.」

LABEL: 0x8A46
STRING: Originally, Tokiwa was meant to ride on the <SHEEP>.

LABEL: 0x8A7B
STRING: What kind of experiment were they planning to carry out with her on board?

LABEL: 0x8ABD
STRING: Making a cage by using bubble-net feeding in Kurama Bay.

LABEL: 0x8AFB
STRING: The theory was to make use of oxygen to isolate the entire area, but what was actually used was――

LABEL: 0x8B62
STRING: 「――Ozone.」

LABEL: 0x8BAB
STRING: 「That's not possible!」

LABEL: 0x8CC2
STRING: Yukari burst into a scream.

LABEL: 0x8CF3
STRING: 「But... if you inhale ozone...!」

LABEL: 0x8D29
STRING: 「If you inhale it...」

LABEL: 0x8D65
STRING: 「There's no way you'd live...」

LABEL: 0x8E8E
STRING: 「...Did you meet Ryuuzen Haruki even once after the accident?」

LABEL: 0x8ED7
STRING: Yukari crumbled.

LABEL: 0x8EF3
STRING: She fell to the floor in shock.

LABEL: 0x8F27
STRING: There were no tears, no voice, like a puppet whose strings had been cut.

LABEL: 0x8FC9
STRING: 「I remember.」

LABEL: 0x8FE7
STRING: 「I didn't know his name, but――」

LABEL: 0x9013
STRING: 「There was a person who was brought in because of ozone poisoning.」

LABEL: 0x904D
STRING: 「It was right after I came to ROMLES, so I remember it well.」

LABEL: 0x908B
STRING: 「By that time, it was too late.」

LABEL: 0x90B9
STRING: 「I'm sure he was already...」

LABEL: 0x90E0
STRING: Whether his voice reached Yukari or not, I wasn't sure.

LABEL: 0x911C
STRING: Hiragino took a bite of his xylitol tablet.

LABEL: 0x9156
STRING: The sound of him chewing down on it was accompanied by his unspoken thoughts.

LABEL: 0x91C3
STRING: 「If you knew, why didn't you tell me...?」

LABEL: 0x9277
STRING: 「...Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x9295
STRING: 「You have a habit of overburdening and blaming yourself too much.」

LABEL: 0x92DD
STRING: 「I was trying to be considerate in my own way... I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x9324
STRING: Hiragino hung his head.

LABEL: 0x9342
STRING: There was no one to blame.

LABEL: 0x93E8
STRING: Still―the painful truth, the sad reality, wouldn't disappear.

LABEL: 0x9435
STRING: 「Please... leave me alone for a little while...」

LABEL: 0x9476
STRING: 「Don't die.」

LABEL: 0x949F
STRING: 「I won't...」

LABEL: 0x94BE
STRING: Yukari didn't move.

LABEL: 0x94D8
STRING: The mistake she had made seven years ago was revealed――

LABEL: 0x9501
STRING: It would take time for her to accept that fact.

LABEL: 0x9543
STRING: Time――

LABEL: 0x97F2
STRING: Even after returning to the third-floor lobby, there was no conversation between us.

LABEL: 0x9832
STRING: Considering what had happened with Yukari just now, it was natural.

LABEL: 0x992C
STRING: Tokiwa, who was well known for her inability to read the air, was also silent.

LABEL: 0x9974
STRING: She was originally supposed to board the <SHEEP>.

LABEL: 0x99B1
STRING: In other words, she could have been in the same position as Yukari or Ryuuzen.

LABEL: 0x9A03
STRING: No doubt she had her own thoughts on the matter.

LABEL: 0x9B04
STRING: 「Anyway...」

LABEL: 0x9B24
STRING: 「It'll be fine... There's nothing blocking our escape.」

LABEL: 0x9B5C
STRING: 「No matter what kind of message Momoi put in there, there's no way ROMLES would abandon us over something like an <Alice> outbreak.」

LABEL: 0x9C30
STRING: 「Rather, it's not about the content of the message.」

LABEL: 0x9C62
STRING: 「Wouldn't they be desperate not to lose their precious <Alice> samples and come rescue us?」

LABEL: 0x9D21
STRING: 「If they do that, you'll be living inside a research institute. For a graduate student with no job prospects, that's all I could hope for.」

LABEL: 0x9D8C
STRING: Reiri chuckled.

LABEL: 0x9DAC
STRING: That wasn't funny...

LABEL: 0x9E08
STRING: However, it was true that as long as the message was delivered and the Argo float was recovered, a rescue would take place without issue.

LABEL: 0x9E78
STRING: All that was left was to survive until then...

LABEL: 0x9EAA
STRING: The time limit for the power and heating wasn't long, but they might last a little longer if we were conservative.

LABEL: 0x9F12
STRING: How much food did we have left?

LABEL: 0x9F44
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0x9F5E
STRING: I could hear the sound of echoing footsteps.

LABEL: 0x9F82
STRING: I turned around to see Yukari.

LABEL: 0xA079
STRING: 「Momoi...」

LABEL: 0xA0A2
STRING: 「Yukari-san!」

LABEL: 0xA0CB
STRING: 「I'm sorry for making you all worry!」

LABEL: 0xA10A
STRING: She bent her hips and bowed her head.

LABEL: 0xA168
STRING: She paused for a moment, then looked up again.

LABEL: 0xA192
STRING: Her cheeks were flushed with embarrassment and her eyes were red.

LABEL: 0xA1D4
STRING: She had been crying, no matter how you looked at it.

LABEL: 0xA2CF
STRING: 「It's all my fault――」

LABEL: 0xA363
STRING: 「It's fine, it's fine! We're all here for each other!」

LABEL: 0xA3FA
STRING: 「Right, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0xA41F
STRING: 「Y-Yeah...」

LABEL: 0xA43D
STRING: What she had done wasn't something to be dismissed by words like that alone...

LABEL: 0xA47F
STRING: But, if everyone was equally guilty, then perhaps we had no choice but to forgive each other.

LABEL: 0xA4EB
STRING: It was only after we reached the surface that we could weigh our sins against each other.

LABEL: 0xA5CB
STRING: 「...But, I have one question.」

LABEL: 0xA603
STRING: 「I did, in fact, see him one month after the accident when I visited his hospital room.」

LABEL: 0xA64B
STRING: 「If that wasn't Ryuuzen-san, then...」

LABEL: 0xA6D8
STRING: 「I don't know who that was...」

LABEL: 0xA711
STRING: 「...I think someone at ROMLES faked it.」

LABEL: 0xA749
STRING: 「You didn't talk since he was asleep, so it's not impossible, right?」

LABEL: 0xA813
STRING: 「Huh... Now that you mention it...」

LABEL: 0xA852
STRING: Yukari cocked her head in dissatisfaction, but――

LABEL: 0xA88A
STRING: Just then.

LABEL: 0xAA58
STRING: 「...Did you hear that just now?」

LABEL: 0xAA8D
STRING: 「Yes, I heard a sound.」

LABEL: 0xAB06
STRING: 「Gon...

LABEL: 0xAB1E
STRING: No,

LABEL: 0xAB7F
STRING: don...

LABEL: 0xAB94
STRING: No, that's not quite right.」

LABEL: 0xAC19
STRING: 「I'll practice for a bit, so please wait.」

LABEL: 0xACB5
STRING: 「There wasn't just the sound! Didn't you feel a shake, too?」

LABEL: 0xAD6D
STRING: 「It shook. Without a doubt.」

LABEL: 0xAE01
STRING: 「Was it an earthquake? Or...」

LABEL: 0xAE2F
STRING: Touri was somewhat jittery and frightened and couldn't help but talk to someone.

LABEL: 0xAE7F
STRING: The giant monster we saw in the wheelhouse immediately crossed my mind.

LABEL: 0xAF51
STRING: An indescribable creature had appeared and covered the large window in front of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xAFAC
STRING: If that thing, which made me shudder just thinking about it, was also a grotesque being born from <COOS>, then...

LABEL: 0xB00C
STRING: I wondered how it felt about ROMLES and us.

LABEL: 0xB056
STRING: Hiragino immediately tried to peer out the window.

LABEL: 0xB1E1
STRING: 「――Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0xB26B
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0xB296
STRING: 「If we want to know what's going on outside, we should go to the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0xB2DC
STRING: 「Even if you look out that window, you won't be able to tell what's happening.」

LABEL: 0xB323
STRING: 「In that case, let's hurry.」

LABEL: 0xB3D1
STRING: We started walking and naturally transitioned into a run.

LABEL: 0xB40D
STRING: Just as we were on the cusp of an escape... Something was happening at that exact moment.

LABEL: 0xB45D
STRING: I couldn't imagine it being anything good.

LABEL: 0xB491
STRING: ――Something.

LABEL: 0xB4A9
STRING: I had a very bad feeling about this.

LABEL: 0xB766
STRING: We should be able to see something from the large window in the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0xB7A6
STRING: Whether its true identity was an aberration or not...

LABEL: 0xB7E0
STRING: Contrary to my expectations, however, I didn't see any shadows outside the window.

LABEL: 0xB82A
STRING: 「Strange...」

LABEL: 0xB8B4
STRING: 「There's nothing strange about it.」

LABEL: 0xB8E6
STRING: 「It could simply have been an earthquake or a strong sea current.」

LABEL: 0xB933
STRING: That was true, but...

LABEL: 0xB9D4
STRING: Something unusual was happening.

LABEL: 0xBA08
STRING: Was that feeling really just my imagination?

LABEL: 0xBA4A
STRING: I took another careful look at the scenery outside the window.

LABEL: 0xBA80
STRING: What was going on beyond this dark, black sea...

LABEL: 0xBBC5
STRING: 「Hey, everyone!」

LABEL: 0xBBE9
STRING: 「Look at that!」

LABEL: 0xBC87
STRING: Touri pointed outside the window.

LABEL: 0xBCA9
STRING: I looked in the direction she was pointing.

LABEL: 0xBCD1
STRING: The dark seabed... a section of it.

LABEL: 0xBCF5
STRING: There―I could see

LABEL: 0xBD21
STRING: a white, long, and thin board-like object.

LABEL: 0xBD4F
STRING: Almost like

LABEL: 0xBD6D
STRING: the bone of a whale...

LABEL: 0xBDA0
STRING: 「Was that thing there all this time?」

LABEL: 0xBDDD
STRING: 「No... This is the first time I've seen it.」

LABEL: 0xBE12
STRING: 「Yeah. Where did it come from?」

LABEL: 0xBE47
STRING: She squinted her eyes as she said that.

LABEL: 0xBE6F
STRING: Come to think of it, she was also the one who had spotted the Argo float.

LABEL: 0xBEAF
STRING: Did she have good eyesight, or good instincts...?

LABEL: 0xBFDC
STRING: 「Akari-chan, everyone, please wait a moment.」

LABEL: 0xC016
STRING: 「Let's look at it with the manipulator's camera.」

LABEL: 0xC053
STRING: Tokiwa headed for the control panel.

LABEL: 0xC083
STRING: With practiced ease, she deftly operated the manipulator's arm and approached the surface of the white object.

LABEL: 0xC0E7
STRING: Once she was close enough, she switched over to the camera.

LABEL: 0xC123
STRING: A white board was projected on the monitor.

LABEL: 0xC210
STRING: Its surface was way smoother than I had thought.

LABEL: 0xC248
STRING: It was an inorganic, man-made object that didn't belong on the seafloor at all.

LABEL: 0xC28C
STRING: It would be one thing if it had been used for a long time, but...

LABEL: 0xC2C6
STRING: It was an artificial object that retained its purity, like it had been in use until just a moment ago.

LABEL: 0xC308
STRING: 「This is...」

LABEL: 0xC324
STRING: I had a gut feeling.

LABEL: 0xC340
STRING: This was not a bone.

LABEL: 0xC362
STRING: ――It was a tombstone.

LABEL: 0xC37C
STRING: A man-made monument created to mourn the dead.

LABEL: 0xC3D8
STRING: The plank was stuck in the seabed as if praying for the death of the <SHEEP III> and us.

LABEL: 0xC435
STRING: This was our tombstone――

LABEL: 0xC45D
STRING: Unreal images swirled inside my brain.

LABEL: 0xC4F5
STRING: But, that was only for a moment.

LABEL: 0xC519
STRING: Tokiwa's approach was more realistic.

LABEL: 0xC554
STRING: 「Could this be...」

LABEL: 0xC57A
STRING: 「――A windmill blade?」

LABEL: 0xC5A9
STRING: In an instant, I recalled the scene I'd seen from the <SHEEP III> before we started diving.

LABEL: 0xC663
STRING: Kurama Bay.

LABEL: 0xC679
STRING: The reconstructed Aqualine.

LABEL: 0xC69F
STRING: And, that white grave marker―the <Isle of Wind>.

LABEL: 0xC6CD
STRING: Chalk-white windmills standing in a row.

LABEL: 0xC6EF
STRING: Their blades were certainly shaped like this――

LABEL: 0xC725
STRING: ...Reiri had said it.

LABEL: 0xC80E
STRING: That the "Fifth Day" was upon us.

LABEL: 0xC836
STRING: That there was chaos on the surface, just like on the "Fourth Day."

LABEL: 0xC874
STRING: It was true that the radio wasn't working.

LABEL: 0xC8A2
STRING: A super flare was occurring―I had accepted that fact.

LABEL: 0xC8EC
STRING: ...I had accepted it, but...

LABEL: 0xC912
STRING: I hadn't imagined it vividly enough.

LABEL: 0xC938
STRING: What was happening on the surface right now?

LABEL: 0xC966
STRING: Remember what happened on the "Fourth Day."

LABEL: 0xC9A2
STRING: Many people were caught up in it.

LABEL: 0xC9C8
STRING: There were numerous tragedies.

LABEL: 0xC9E2
STRING: Rescue hadn't reached them even on the surface, and here, at the bottom of the sea...

LABEL: 0xCA24
STRING: It had been naive of us to just sit back and wait.

LABEL: 0xCAD2
STRING: 「The need for a "rescue"

LABEL: 0xCAF8
STRING: may be the same on the surface as well.」

LABEL: 0xCB2B
STRING: If we assumed that Reiri was right, then...

LABEL: 0xCB59
STRING: ...Simply waiting around wasn't enough to save us.
